activities: SourceHOV is a leader in Global Business Process Outsourcing (BPO).  SourceHOV combines leading edge technology and infrastructure with subject matter expertise to result in end-to-end solutions for data process and information services.  SourceHOV USA provides workflow process and composition services to payroll check, advice and P60 data.  Personal information is received by SourceHOV within the USA.  SourceHOV processes the data in the USA and transfers fully composed data to the UK for print and distribution services within the UK.  SourceHOV streamlines and integrates processes with SourceHOV’s workflow to provide BPO service offerings.  In addition, SourceHOV provides Account Payable transactions including, but not limited to: Account Transfers, Check Requests, Accounts Payable Processing, Statements and Invoices, and Printing.  SourceHOV transfers such data between various European Union states, and the USA.
contacttitle1: Director of Information Security and Risk
eucountries: Austria, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Human Resources Data; Accounts Payable Processing; Invoices and Statements; Payments: Transfers; Checks and Printing
